app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Recorder for iPhone
app_description: The easiest voice recorder ever! A new modern design makes it even easier to capture and share personal notes family moments classroom lectures work meetings speeches interviews and more. Also It can help you learn languages easily. Editing tools like trim covert merge and cutlet you fine tune your recordings. And use other more functions eg: Transcribe to do even more to help you work efficiently. Features: 1. Easy to Record: Choose audio formats such as MP3 M4A AIFC WAV. Plan your recording schedule. 2. Easy to listen: Quickly find recordings with the search feature. Jump 5 seconds forward or back. Stop playback at the scheduled time. Change speed. 3. Easy to Edit: Trim your recordings to save just the portion you want. Rename and tag recordings. Convert your recordings to other formats. 4. Easy to share export: Share recordings via AirDrop Mail Messages Facebook and more. Wi Fi file sharing let you save recordings to your PC without any cable connections. iTunes file sharing support. Save to camera roll then access recordings in Albums . 5. Transcribe voice recordings new : Instant and Accurate: Transcribe voice recordings with exceptional accuracy. Time Saving: Save valuable time by automating the transcription process. Easy Accessibility: Read and review recordings in text format for effortless reference. Language Learning Aid: Analyze pronunciation and language patterns for enhanced learning. Weekly Subscription 4.99 week. Monthly Subscription 9.99 month with free trial Yearly Subscription 32.99 year Membership is enabled via an auto renewing subscription. The Price of the subscription is shown in the Purchase pane updated to the time of the purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase or the end of the Free Trial Period if any. The length of the Free Trial Period if any is shown in the Purchase Pane updated to the time of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period with the same amount as the first period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication where applicable.
